text: We anticipated low response rate owing to the outbreak of Middle East respiratory syndrome-corona virus (MERS-cov) in Riyadh city during the study period. Therefore, a total of 1130 questionnaires were distributed to parents and we received 578 completed questionnaires at a response rate of 51% from 12 out of 15 schools considered for recruitment among 513 government primary schools for boys in Riyadh region.
